wordpressPost.title: Join our Twitter Chat for Earth Day Inspiration
wordpressPost.content:
We are excited to announce our annual Pre-Earth Day Twitter Chat will take place next Wednesday, March 15th from 2-3pm ET.

In our annual Twitter chat we will discuss sustainability goals, programming, and employee involvement with leading enterprise organizations, sustainability and CSR thought leaders, and non-profits from around the world.
Here’s a teaser of the types of questions you can expect us to discuss during our hour-long chat.

  • How does your organization celebrate Earth Day?
  • Does your business have a sustainability program or an environmental mission?
  • What are the top three things people can do to increase efficiency and reduce waste?

In the Twitter chat, you’ll have the opportunity to hear from representatives from:
@CoxEnterprises, the leading communications and automotive services company, will speak about its Cox Conserves programs. Originally aimed at reducing carbon consumption, hear how the program was expanded to include water and waste reduction.
@BASFCorporation, the largest chemical producer in the world, will share how it built an entire business and culture around their corporate purpose: We create chemistry for a sustainable future.
@CitizenCaesars, the world’s most diversified casino-entertainment provider, will speak about CodeGreen, the organization-wide, multi-year strategy that identifies, monitors, measures, assesses, manages and reduces its material impacts on the environment.
@NRGInsight, the leading integrated power company in the U.S., will discuss the three core groups of its sustainability strategy: renewables, generation, and retail, as well as how to effectively engage key stakeholders in sustainability.

We invite all of you to join in or follow along with this inspiring and insightful Twitter chat. To participate, be sure to use the hashtag #goEarthDay!
